product_name: Big Agnes mtnGLO Light Accessory Kit
long_description: String up these mtnGLOTM LED lights to illuminate your tent, shelter or campsite. They provide enough light to sort gear, play cards or hang with friends without blinding them with a headlamp.
short_description: String up these mtnGLOTM LED lights to illuminate your tent, shelter or campsite. They provide enough light to sort gear, play cards or hang with friends without blinding them with a headlamp.
